page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: Most of the residents have gardens and grow both vegetables and flowers, the village organises a flower show in September and most enter their produce and crafts making a fine display. Other recreation is catered for by various village clubs, such as the youth club which organises sporting events with other villages, arranges trips and sponsered events. The swimming club, hires the pool at Appleby for 1 hour, on Monday nights during the summer. The badminton club meets in the village hall on Wednesday evenings and occasionally arranges matches against other teams. The children join girl guides, brownies and cubs at Kirkby Thore. Domino's, darts and pool can be played at the Stag Inn, Gullom. People also travel outside the area for other recreational activities.
